actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the General Education Provisions Act to remove from the category of protected education records certain records of law enforcement units.

summary.text: Amends the General Education Provisions Act to permit an educational agency or institution to receive Federal funds even though the parents of children who are or have been in attendance at a school of such agency or at such institution are prevented from inspecting and reviewing certain law enforcement unit records of their children, so long as such records are routinely made available to persons not officers or employees of the law enforcement unit only in accordance with generally accepted police practices.

titles.title: A bill to amend the General Education Provisions Act to remove from the category of protected education records certain records of law enforcement units.
